revised_title: January 7, 1886: Proceedings of the Royal Society of London
tldr: This article presents a list of publications and research updates from January 7, 1886, in the Proceedings of the Royal Society of London. Topics include lowest forms of living things, physiology, Aryan and Aboriginal races of India, consumption causes, and photographic media.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Science history
